price: ߊ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߸ ߒ ߘߍ߬ߡߍ߲߫ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ߬ ߕߌߢߍߟߌߟߊ ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߖߊ߰ߣߌ߫
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي عَلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi unṣur'nī ʿalā al-qawmi al-muf'sidīna
